name: Stampy
tagline: Java implementation of the STOMP 1.2 specification
body:
### Stampy - a Java Implementation of the STOMP 1.2 Specification
This is a placeholder for a high-level description.  Stampy creates STOMP messages via Java classes and uses [Apache MINA](https://mina.apache.org/) to facilitate network connections.  STOMP messages are dealt with via an implementation of an interface.  It is simple to use and requires little configuration.  It includes both a client & a server implementation which can easily be tailored for individual use.

A work in progress - a release will be made available shortly.
